content.value:
pThe PostGIS Team is pleased to release PostGIS 3.5.0!
Best Served with a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://www.postgresql.org/about/news/postgresql-17-rc1-released-2926/"
PostgreSQL 17 RC1/a
and a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://github.com/libgeos/geos/releases/tag/3.13.0"
GEOS 3.13.0/a./p
pThis version requires PostgreSQL 12 - 17, GEOS 3.8 or higher, and Proj 6.1+.
To take advantage of all features, GEOS 3.12+ is needed.
SFCGAL 1.4+ is needed to enable postgis_sfcgal support.
To take advantage of all SFCGAL features, SFCGAL 1.5 is needed./p
div class="gdoc-page__anchorwrap"
    h3 id="350"
    
        3.5.0
        a data-clipboard-text="https://postgis.net/2024/09/PostGIS-3.5.0/#350" class="gdoc-page__anchor clip flex align-center" title="Anchor to: 3.5.0" aria-label="Anchor to: 3.5.0" href="#350"
            svg class="gdoc-icon gdoc_link"use xlink:href="#gdoc_link"/use/svg
        /a
    /h3
/div
ul
li
pa
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/source/postgis-3.5.0.tar.gz"
source download/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/stuff/postgis-3.5.0.tar.gz.md5"
md5/a/p
/li
li
pa
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://git.osgeo.org/gitea/postgis/postgis/raw/tag/3.5.0/NEWS"
NEWS/a/p
/li
li
pPDF docs: a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0-en.pdf"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0-ja.pdf"
ja/a, a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0-fr.pdf"
fr/a, a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0-zh_Hans.pdf"
zh_Hans/a/p
/li
li
pHTML Online a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/en/"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/ja/"
ja/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/fr/"
fr/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/zh_Hans/"
zh_Hans/a/p
/li
li
pCheat Sheets:/p
ul
lipostgis: a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/postgis_cheatsheet-en.html"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/postgis_cheatsheet-ja.html"
ja/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/postgis_cheatsheet-fr.html"
fr/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/postgis_cheatsheet-zh_Hans.html"
zh_Hans/a/li
lipostgis_raster: a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/raster_cheatsheet-en.html"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/raster_cheatsheet-ja.html"
ja/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/raster_cheatsheet-fr.html"
fr/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/raster_cheatsheet-zh_Hans.html"
zh_Hans/a/li
lipostgis_topology: a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/topology_cheatsheet-en.html"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/topology_cheatsheet-ja.html"
ja/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/topology_cheatsheet-fr.html"
fr/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/topology_cheatsheet-zh_Hans.html"
zh_Hans/a/li
lipostgis_sfcgal: a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/sfcgal_cheatsheet-en.html"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/sfcgal_cheatsheet-ja.html"
ja/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/sfcgal_cheatsheet-fr.html"
fr/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/sfcgal_cheatsheet-zh_Hans.html"
zh_Hans/a/li
liaddress standardizer, postgis_tiger_geocoder: a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/tiger_geocoder_cheatsheet-en.html"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/tiger_geocoder_cheatsheet-ja.html"
ja/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/tiger_geocoder_cheatsheet-fr.html"
fr/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/docs/manual-3.5/tiger_geocoder_cheatsheet-zh_Hans.html"
zh_Hans/a/li
/ul
/li
/ul
pThis release is a feature release that includes bug fixes since PostGIS 3.4.3, new features, and a few breaking changes./p

entries.description:
pThe PostGIS Team is pleased to release PostGIS 3.5.0!
Best Served with a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://www.postgresql.org/about/news/postgresql-17-rc1-released-2926/"
PostgreSQL 17 RC1/a
and a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://github.com/libgeos/geos/releases/tag/3.13.0"
GEOS 3.13.0/a./p
pThis version requires PostgreSQL 12 - 17, GEOS 3.8 or higher, and Proj 6.1+.
To take advantage of all features, GEOS 3.12+ is needed.
SFCGAL 1.4+ is needed to enable postgis_sfcgal support.
To take advantage of all SFCGAL features, SFCGAL 1.5 is needed./p

content.value:
pThe PostGIS Team is pleased to release PostGIS 3.5.0beta1!
Best Served with a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://www.postgresql.org/about/news/postgresql-17-rc1-released-2926/"
PostgreSQL 17 RC1/a
and a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://github.com/libgeos/geos/releases/tag/3.13.0"
GEOS 3.13.0/a./p
pThis version requires PostgreSQL 12 - 17, GEOS 3.8 or higher, and Proj 6.1+.
To take advantage of all features, GEOS 3.12+ is needed.
SFCGAL 1.4+ is needed to enable postgis_sfcgal support.
To take advantage of all SFCGAL features, SFCGAL 1.5 is needed./p
div class="gdoc-page__anchorwrap"
    h3 id="350beta1"
    
        3.5.0beta1
        a data-clipboard-text="https://postgis.net/2024/09/PostGIS-3.5.0beta1/#350beta1" class="gdoc-page__anchor clip flex align-center" title="Anchor to: 3.5.0beta1" aria-label="Anchor to: 3.5.0beta1" href="#350beta1"
            svg class="gdoc-icon gdoc_link"use xlink:href="#gdoc_link"/use/svg
        /a
    /h3
/div
ul
lia
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/source/postgis-3.5.0beta1.tar.gz"
source download/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/stuff/postgis-3.5.0beta1.tar.gz.md5"
md5/a/li
lia
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://git.osgeo.org/gitea/postgis/postgis/raw/tag/3.5.0beta1/NEWS"
NEWS/a/li
liPDF docs: a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0beta1-en.pdf"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0beta1-ja.pdf"
ja/a, a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0beta1-zh_Hans.pdf"
zh_Hans/a,  a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0beta1-fr.pdf"
fr/a/li
/ul
pThis release is a beta of a major release, it includes bug fixes since PostGIS 3.4.3 and new features./p

content.value:
pThe PostGIS Team is pleased to release PostGIS 3.5.0rc1!
Best Served with a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://www.postgresql.org/about/news/postgresql-17-rc1-released-2926/"
PostgreSQL 17 RC1/a
and a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://github.com/libgeos/geos/releases/tag/3.13.0"
GEOS 3.13.0/a./p
pThis version requires PostgreSQL 12 - 17, GEOS 3.8 or higher, and Proj 6.1+.
To take advantage of all features, GEOS 3.12+ is needed.
SFCGAL 1.4+ is needed to enable postgis_sfcgal support.
To take advantage of all SFCGAL features, SFCGAL 1.5 is needed./p
div class="gdoc-page__anchorwrap"
    h3 id="350rc1"
    
        3.5.0rc1
        a data-clipboard-text="https://postgis.net/2024/09/PostGIS-3.5.0rc1/#350rc1" class="gdoc-page__anchor clip flex align-center" title="Anchor to: 3.5.0rc1" aria-label="Anchor to: 3.5.0rc1" href="#350rc1"
            svg class="gdoc-icon gdoc_link"use xlink:href="#gdoc_link"/use/svg
        /a
    /h3
/div
ul
lia
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/source/postgis-3.5.0rc1.tar.gz"
source download/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/stuff/postgis-3.5.0rc1.tar.gz.md5"
md5/a/li
lia
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://git.osgeo.org/gitea/postgis/postgis/raw/tag/3.5.0rc1/NEWS"
NEWS/a/li
liPDF docs: a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0rc1-en.pdf"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0rc1-ja.pdf"
ja/a, a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0rc1-zh_Hans.pdf"
zh_Hans/a,  a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0rc1-fr.pdf"
fr/a/li
/ul
pThis release is a release candidate of a major release, it includes bug fixes since PostGIS 3.4.3 and new features./p
pChanges since 3.5.0beta1 are as follows:/p
ul
lia
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://trac.osgeo.org/postgis/ticket/5779"
#5779/a Failures building in parallel mode (Sandro Santilli)/li
lia
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://trac.osgeo.org/postgis/ticket/5778"
#5778/a, Sections missing in Whatrsquo;s new (Regina Obe)/li
/ul

content.value:
pThe PostGIS Team is pleased to release PostGIS 3.4.7! This is a bug fix release./p
div class="gdoc-page__anchorwrap"

content.value:
pThe PostGIS Team is pleased to release PostGIS 3.4.3!/p
pThis version requires PostgreSQL 12-17, GEOS 3.8+, and Proj 6.1+.
To take advantage of all features, GEOS 3.12+ is needed.
To take advantage of all SFCGAL features, SFCGAL 1.5+ is needed./p

content.value:
pThe PostGIS Team is pleased to release PostGIS 3.5.0alpha2!
Best Served with a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://www.postgresql.org/about/news/postgresql-17-beta-2-released-2885/"
PostgreSQL 17 Beta2/a
and a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://github.com/libgeos/geos/releases/tag/3.12.2"
GEOS 3.12.2/a./p
pThis version requires PostgreSQL 12 - 17, GEOS 3.8 or higher, and Proj 6.1+.
To take advantage of all features, GEOS 3.12+ is needed.
SFCGAL 1.4-1.5 is needed to enable postgis_sfcgal support.
To take advantage of all SFCGAL features, SFCGAL 1.5 is needed./p
div class="gdoc-page__anchorwrap"
    h3 id="350alpha2"
    
        3.5.0alpha2
        a data-clipboard-text="https://postgis.net/2024/07/PostGIS-3.5.0alpha2/#350alpha2" class="gdoc-page__anchor clip flex align-center" title="Anchor to: 3.5.0alpha2" aria-label="Anchor to: 3.5.0alpha2" href="#350alpha2"
            svg class="gdoc-icon gdoc_link"use xlink:href="#gdoc_link"/use/svg
        /a
    /h3
/div
ul
lia
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/source/postgis-3.5.0alpha2.tar.gz"
source download/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://postgis.net/stuff/postgis-3.5.0alpha2.tar.gz.md5"
md5/a/li
lia
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://git.osgeo.org/gitea/postgis/postgis/raw/tag/3.5.0alpha2/NEWS"
NEWS/a/li
liPDF docs: a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0alpha2-en.pdf"
en/a a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0alpha2-ja.pdf"
ja/a, a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0alpha2-zh_Hans.pdf"
zh_Hans/a,  a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://download.osgeo.org/postgis/docs/postgis-3.5.0alpha2-fr.pdf"
fr/a/li
/ul
pThis release is an alpha of a major release, it includes bug fixes since PostGIS 3.4.2 and new features./p

content.value:
The PostGIS development team is pleased to provide bug fix releases for 3.4.2, 3.3.6, 3.2.7, 3.1.11, 3.0.11, and 2.5.11.
Please refer to the links above for more information about the issues resolved by these releases.

entries.description:

Please refer to the links above for more information about the issues resolved by these releases.

content.value:
pThe PostGIS development team is pleased to provide
bug fix and performance enhancements
3.4.1, 3.3.5, 3.2.6, 3.1.10, 3.0.10  for the 3.4, 3.3, 3.2, 3.1, 3.0 stable branches./p

content.value:
pThe PostGIS Team is pleased to release PostGIS 3.4.0!
This version works with versions PostgreSQL 12-16, GEOS 3.6 or higher, and Proj 6.1+.
To take advantage of all features, a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://libgeos.org/posts/2023-06-27-geos-3-12-released/"
GEOS 3.12+/a is needed.
To take advantage of all SFCGAL features,
a
  class="gdoc-markdown__link"
  href="https://sfcgal.org"
SFCGAL/a 1.4.1+ is needed./p
